r.d:
This is a quick and efficient BBCode Parsing Library. It provides various tag types, high speed one pass parsing, callback system, tag position restriction.
It will force closing BBCode tags in the good order, and closing terminating tags at the end of the string this is in order to ensure HTML Validity in all case.
r.n: * Corrected a possible Double Free off tag arguments. * Corrected a possible Segmentation Fault on incorrect close tags. ** Corrected incorrect detection of close tags when ] was missing at the end of the string. * Added efree for smileys initialisation that was leading to runtime leaking. * Make the DISABLE_TREE_BUILD work +added test * Added BBCODE_FLAGS_DENY_REOPEN_CHILD to permits some tags to Deny child reopening * Added BBCODE_SMILEYS_CASE_INSENSITIVE to permits case insensitive smileys detection * Corrected Memory leaking of smileys strings. * Makes bbcode_set_flags work correctly.
